txt.en:
'Umukh-kanon was once among the finest of Khazad-dûm's forges. It produced weapons and armour that every dwarf coveted. Though it is a small workshop, the attention to detail there was nearly unparalleled.

'Before I was chased out by the fiery Rock-worms who now call it home. I was able to see several crates littered around. I believe those crates still hold some of the moulds the master crafstmen of old used to make their masterpieces.

'Return south-west to Umukh-kanon and bring me back the moulds that forge holds. I do not know if any of the forges there will still catch fire, but those moulds are valuable anywhere we cast metal. You may want to bring a friend or two, it looked dangerous.'

'These moulds are incredible, [placeholder]. Look at the workmanship! I can easily see why the weapons and armour of old still hold up, even today.\n\n'Thank you! With these, we will be able to make some much-needed high-quality pieces.'
'The weapons and armour we could craft with those moulds could turn the tide and allow us to reclaim all of Khazad-dûm!'
HIDING CONTENT - DNT - Umukh-kanon: Mould in the Forge
The forges of the dwarves were famous for making the finest of arms and armour. The dwarves believe Umukh-kanon may still hold some of the ancient moulds.

Ancient moulds can be found in Umukh-kanon, to the south-west of Anazârmekhem.\n\nÖlfun asked you to venture to the forges of Umukh-kanon and bring back several moulds left from the ancient times. Ölfun suggested you bring a friend or two.
Bring the ancient moulds to Ölfun in Anazârmekhem
Ölfun is at Anazârmekhem, north-east of Umukh-kanon.\n\nÖlfun will be pleased to receive the ancient moulds you gathered from Umukh-kanon.
